sub_interfaces.name: AS_CO_CP_checkBoxField
sub_interfaces.description:
Generic checkbox field that handles read-only logic dynamically. 

For instances where a custom value should be displayed when the component is read-only, pass it into the "readOnlyValue" input.

data.sail_code:
with(
  local!displayValue: apply(
    displayvalue(_, ri!choiceValues, ri!choiceLabels, null),
    {ri!value}
  ),
  if(ri!readOnly,
    rule!AS_CO_DSP_standardReadOnlyField(
      label: ri!label,
      instructions: ri!instructions,
      value: if(isnull(ri!readOnlyValue),
        if(rule!AS_CO_UT_isBlank(local!displayValue),
            null,
            joinarray(local!displayValue, char(10))
          ),
        ri!readOnlyValue
      ),
      labelPosition: ri!labelPosition,
      helpTooltip: ri!helpTooltip,
      showWhen: if(isnull(ri!showWhen), true, ri!showWhen),
      accessibilityText: ri!accessibilityText
    ),
    #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_checkboxField"(
      label: ri!label,
      labelPosition: rule!AS_CO_UT_getLabelPosition(
        label: ri!label,
        labelPosition: ri!labelPosition,
        readOnly: ri!readOnly
      ),
      instructions: ri!instructions,
      helpTooltip: ri!helpTooltip,
      choiceLabels: ri!choiceLabels,
      choiceValues: ri!choiceValues,
      value: if(rule!AS_CO_UT_isBlank(local!displayValue),
        null,
        ri!value
      ),
      saveInto: ri!saveInto,
      showWhen: if(isnull(ri!showWhen), true, ri!showWhen),
      required: if(ri!readOnly, false, ri!required),
      /* Updated requiredMessage parameter to show default validation text*/
      requiredMessage: rule!AS_CO_UT_displayRequiredMessage(
        label: ri!label,
        requiredMessage: ri!requiredMessage
      ),
      disabled: ri!disabled,
      choiceLayout: ri!choiceLayout,
      validations: ri!validations,
      validationGroup: ri!validationGroup,
      align: ri!align,
      accessibilityText: ri!accessibilityText
    )
  )
)

sub_interfaces.name: AS_CO_DSP_standardReadOnlyField
sub_interfaces.description: Standard readOnly field, utilizes a!textField(), use a!richTextDisplayField() for further formatting

data.sail_code:
#"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_textField"(
  label: ri!label,
  labelPosition: rule!AS_CO_UT_getLabelPosition(
    label: ri!label,
    labelPosition: ri!labelPosition,
    readOnly: true
  ),
  instructions: ri!instructions,
  helpTooltip: ri!helpTooltip,
  value: rule!AS_CO_UT_replaceNull(
    nullableValue: ri!value,
    replacementValue: if(
      rule!AS_CO_UT_booleanDefaultTrue(
        ri!showHyphenIfValueNull
      ),
      "-",
      ""
    )
  ),
  showWhen: ri!showWhen,
  readOnly: true,
  align: ri!align,
  accessibilityText: ri!accessibilityText
)

expression_rules.name: AS_GSS_constructConsensusDocument
expression_rules.description: Constructs consensus document of AS_GSS_EvaluationDocument type CDT.

data.sail_code:
a!localVariables(
  local!documentProperty: rule!AS_CO_UT_documentProperty(
    document: ri!consensusDocument,
    property: _
  ),
  local!consensusDoc: 'type!{urn:com:appian:types:AS:GSS}AS_GSS_EvaluationDocument'(
    appianDocId: ri!consensusDocument,
    evaluationId: ri!consensus.evaluationId,
    consensusId: ri!consensus.consensusId,
    criteriaId: ri!consensus.factorId,
    vendorId: ri!consensus.vendorId,
    documentName: local!documentProperty("name"),
    documentDesc: local!documentProperty("description"),
    fileType: local!documentProperty("extension"),
    docType: rule!AS_GSS_QE_getRefDataByTypes(
      refDataIds: cons!AS_GSS_REF_ID_DOC_TYPE_CONSENSUS
    ),
    isDeleted: false,
    sourceApplication: 'type!{urn:com:appian:types:AS:GSS}AS_GSS_R_Data'(
      refDataId: cons!AS_GSS_REF_ID_SOURCE_APPLICATION_GSS
    )
  ),
  rule!AS_CO_UT_captureMetadata(
    cdt: local!consensusDoc,
    modifiedBy: ri!initiator
  )
)

a!localVariables(
  local!documentProperty: rule!AS_CO_UT_documentProperty(

    evaluationId: ri!consensus.evaluationId,

    vendorId: ri!consensus.vendorId,
    documentName: local!documentProperty("name"),
    documentDesc: local!documentProperty("description"),
    fileType: local!documentProperty("extension"),
    docType: rule!AS_GSS_QE_getRefDataByTypes(
      refDataIds: cons!AS_GSS_REF_ID_DOC_TYPE_CONSENSUS
    ),
    isDeleted: false,
    sourceApplication: 'type!{urn:com:appian:types:AS:GSS}AS_GSS_R_Data'(
      refDataId: cons!AS_GSS_REF_ID_SOURCE_APPLICATION_GSS
    )
  ),
  rule!AS_CO_UT_captureMetadata(
    cdt: local!consensusDoc,
    modifiedBy: ri!initiator
  )
)

expression_rules.name: AS_GSS_UT_createTableRowWithDynamicColumns
expression_rules.description: Returns the OOXML code for table row with dynamic number of columns based on ri!cells.

data.sail_code:
a!localVariables(
  local!tableBorderColor: a!defaultValue(
    value: ri!tableBorderColor,
    default: "000000"
  ),
  local!fontSize: a!defaultValue(
    value: ri!fontSize,
    default: "20"
  ),
  local!tableAlignment: a!defaultValue(
    value: ri!tableAlignment,
    default: "left"
  ),
  local!tableWidth: a!defaultValue(
    value: ri!tableWidth,
    default: "14000.0"
  ),
  local!tableColumnWidth: a!defaultValue(
    value: ri!tableColumnWidth,
    default: "4500"
  ),
  local!isDefaultFormattingForColumnText: a!defaultValue(
    ri!isDefaultFormattingForColumnText,
    true
  ),
  "<w:tbl>
  <w:tblPr>
    <w:tblStyle w:val=" & char(34) & "Table1" & char(34) & "/>
    <w:tblW w:w=" & char(34) & local!tableWidth & char(34) & " w:type=" & char(34) & "dxa" & char(34) & "/>
    <w:jc w:val=" & char(34) & local!tableAlignment & char(34) & "/>
    <w:tblInd w:w=" & char(34) & "100.0" & char(34) & " w:type=" & char(34) & "pct" & char(34) & "/>
    <w:tblBorders>
      <w:top w:color=" & char(34) & local!tableBorderColor & char(34) & " w:space=" & char(34) & "0" & char(34) & " w:sz=" & char(34) & "8" & char(34) & " w:val=" & char(34) & "single" & char(34) & "/>
      <w:left w:color=" & char(34) & local!tableBorderColor & char(34) & " w:space=" & char(34) & "0" & char(34) & " w:sz=" & char(34) & "8" & char(34) & " w:val=" & char(34) & "single" & char(34) & "/>
      <w:bottom w:color=" & char(34) & local!tableBorderColor & char(34) & " w:space=" & char(34) & "0" & char(34) & " w:sz=" & char(34) & "8" & char(34) & " w:val=" & char(34) & "single" & char(34) & "/>
      <w:right w:color=" & char(34) & local!tableBorderColor & char(34) & " w:space=" & char(34) & "0" & char(34) & " w:sz=" & char(34) & "8" & char(34) & " w:val=" & char(34) & "single" & char(34) & "/>
      <w:insideH w:color=" & char(34) & local!tableBorderColor & char(34) & " w:space=" & char(34) & "0" & char(34) & " w:sz=" & char(34) & "8" & char(34) & " w:val=" & char(34) & "single" & char(34) & "/>
      <w:insideV w:color=" & char(34) & local!tableBorderColor & char(34) & " w:space=" & char(34) & "0" & char(34) & " w:sz=" & char(34) & "8" & char(34) & " w:val=" & char(34) & "single" & char(34) & "/>
    </w:tblBorders>
    <w:tblLayout w:type=" & char(34) & "fixed" & char(34) & "/>
    <w:tblLook w:val=" & char(34) & "0600" & char(34) & "/>
  </w:tblPr>
  <w:tblGrid>" &
  concat(
    #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_forEach"(
      ri!cells,
      "<w:gridCol w:w=" & char(34) & local!tableColumnWidth & char(34) & "/>"
    )
  )
  & "</w:tblGrid>
  <w:tr>
    <w:trPr>
      <w:cantSplit w:val=" & char(34) & "0" & char(34) & "/>
      <w:tblHeader w:val=" & char(34) & "0" & char(34) & "/>
    </w:trPr>" &
    concat(
      #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_forEach"(
        ri!cells,
        rule!AS_GSS_UT_createTableCell(
          column: fv!item,
          fontSize: local!fontSize,
          isDefaultFormattingForColumnText: local!isDefaultFormattingForColumnText
        )
      )
    )
  & "</w:tr>
  </w:tbl>"
)
data.definition:
a!localVariables(
  local!tableBorderColor: a!defaultValue(
    value: ri!tableBorderColor,
    default: "000000"
  ),
  local!fontSize: a!defaultValue(
    value: ri!fontSize,
    default: "20"
  ),
  local!tableAlignment: a!defaultValue(
    value: ri!tableAlignment,
    default: "left"
  ),
  local!tableWidth: a!defaultValue(
    value: ri!tableWidth,
    default: "14000.0"
  ),
  local!tableColumnWidth: a!defaultValue(
    value: ri!tableColumnWidth,
    default: "4500"
  ),
  local!isDefaultFormattingForColumnText: a!defaultValue(
    ri!isDefaultFormattingForColumnText, 
    true
  ),
  "<w:tbl>
  <w:tblPr>
    <w:tblStyle w:val=" & char(34) & "Table1" & char(34) & "/>
    <w:tblW w:w=" & char(34) & local!tableWidth & char(34) & " w:type=" & char(34) & "dxa" & char(34) & "/>
    <w:jc w:val=" & char(34) & local!tableAlignment & char(34) & "/>
    <w:tblInd w:w=" & char(34) & "100.0" & char(34) & " w:type=" & char(34) & "pct" & char(34) & "/>
    <w:tblBorders>
      <w:top w:color=" & char(34) & local!tableBorderColor & char(34) & " w:space=" & char(34) & "0" & char(34) & " w:sz=" & char(34) & "8" & char(34) & " w:val=" & char(34) & "single" & char(34) & "/>
      <w:left w:color=" & char(34) & local!tableBorderColor & char(34) & " w:space=" & char(34) & "0" & char(34) & " w:sz=" & char(34) & "8" & char(34) & " w:val=" & char(34) & "single" & char(34) & "/>
      <w:bottom w:color=" & char(34) & local!tableBorderColor & char(34) & " w:space=" & char(34) & "0" & char(34) & " w:sz=" & char(34) & "8" & char(34) & " w:val=" & char(34) & "single" & char(34) & "/>
      <w:right w:color=" & char(34) & local!tableBorderColor & char(34) & " w:space=" & char(34) & "0" & char(34) & " w:sz=" & char(34) & "8" & char(34) & " w:val=" & char(34) & "single" & char(34) & "/>
      <w:insideH w:color=" & char(34) & local!tableBorderColor & char(34) & " w:space=" & char(34) & "0" & char(34) & " w:sz=" & char(34) & "8" & char(34) & " w:val=" & char(34) & "single" & char(34) & "/>
      <w:insideV w:color=" & char(34) & local!tableBorderColor & char(34) & " w:space=" & char(34) & "0" & char(34) & " w:sz=" & char(34) & "8" & char(34) & " w:val=" & char(34) & "single" & char(34) & "/>
    </w:tblBorders>
    <w:tblLayout w:type=" & char(34) & "fixed" & char(34) & "/>
    <w:tblLook w:val=" & char(34) & "0600" & char(34) & "/>
  </w:tblPr>
  <w:tblGrid>" &
  concat(
    #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_forEach"(
      ri!cells,
      "<w:gridCol w:w=" & char(34) & local!tableColumnWidth & char(34) & "/>"
    )
  )
  & "</w:tblGrid>
  <w:tr>
    <w:trPr>
      <w:cantSplit w:val=" & char(34) & "0" & char(34) & "/>
      <w:tblHeader w:val=" & char(34) & "0" & char(34) & "/>
    </w:trPr>" &
    concat(
      #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_forEach"(
        ri!cells,
        rule!AS_GSS_UT_createTableCell(
          column: fv!item,
          fontSize: local!fontSize,
          isDefaultFormattingForColumnText: local!isDefaultFormattingForColumnText
        )
      )
    )
  & "</w:tr>
  </w:tbl>"
)

expression_rules.name: AS_ADT_UT_determineAuditActionCode
expression_rules.description: Given a newObject, an oldObject, and the auditConfig, determines the auditActionCode

data.sail_code:
choose(
  where(
    {
      rule!AS_CO_UT_isNotBlank(ri!externalAction),
      rule!AS_CO_UT_isBlank(index(ri!originalObject, ri!auditConfig.idField, null)),
      rule!AS_CO_UT_isBlank(index(ri!newObject, ri!auditConfig.idField, null)),
      toboolean(index(ri!originalObject, "isActive", 1)) = toboolean(index(ri!newObject, "isActive", 1)),
      toboolean(index(ri!originalObject, "isActive", false)),
      toboolean(index(ri!newObject, "isActive", true))
    }
  )[1],
  ri!externalAction,
  cons!AS_ADT_ENUM_AUDIT_ACTION_CODE_ADD,
  cons!AS_ADT_ENUM_AUDIT_ACTION_CODE_DELETE,
  cons!AS_ADT_ENUM_AUDIT_ACTION_CODE_MODIFY,
  cons!AS_ADT_ENUM_AUDIT_ACTION_CODE_DEACTIVATE,
  cons!AS_ADT_ENUM_AUDIT_ACTION_CODE_REACTIVATE
)

expression_rules.description: Returns the OOXML code of table header row and creates columns dynamically based on ri!headers.

data.sail_code:
a!localVariables(
  local!tableBorderColor: a!defaultValue(
    value: ri!tableBorderColor,
    default: "000000"
  ),
  local!fontSize: a!defaultValue(
    value: ri!fontSize,
    default: "20"
  ),
  "<w:tbl>
  <w:tblPr>
    <w:tblStyle w:val=" & char(34) & "Table1" & char(34) & "/>
    <w:tblW w:w=" & char(34) & "14000.0" & char(34) & " w:type=" & char(34) & "dxa" & char(34) & "/>
    <w:jc w:val=" & char(34) & "left" & char(34) & "/>
    <w:tblInd w:w=" & char(34) & "100.0" & char(34) & " w:type=" & char(34) & "pct" & char(34) & "/>
    <w:tblBorders>
      <w:top w:color=" & char(34) & local!tableBorderColor & char(34) & " w:space=" & char(34) & "0" & char(34) & " w:sz=" & char(34) & "4" & char(34) & " w:val=" & char(34) & "single" & char(34) & "/>
      <w:left w:color=" & char(34) & local!tableBorderColor & char(34) & " w:space=" & char(34) & "0" & char(34) & " w:sz=" & char(34) & "4" & char(34) & " w:val=" & char(34) & "single" & char(34) & "/>
      <w:bottom w:color=" & char(34) & local!tableBorderColor & char(34) & " w:space=" & char(34) & "0" & char(34) & " w:sz=" & char(34) & "4" & char(34) & " w:val=" & char(34) & "single" & char(34) & "/>
      <w:right w:color=" & char(34) & local!tableBorderColor & char(34) & " w:space=" & char(34) & "0" & char(34) & " w:sz=" & char(34) & "4" & char(34) & " w:val=" & char(34) & "single" & char(34) & "/>
      <w:insideH w:color=" & char(34) & local!tableBorderColor & char(34) & " w:space=" & char(34) & "0" & char(34) & " w:sz=" & char(34) & "4" & char(34) & " w:val=" & char(34) & "single" & char(34) & "/>
      <w:insideV w:color=" & char(34) & local!tableBorderColor & char(34) & " w:space=" & char(34) & "0" & char(34) & " w:sz=" & char(34) & "4" & char(34) & " w:val=" & char(34) & "single" & char(34) & "/>
    </w:tblBorders>
    <w:tblLayout w:type=" & char(34) & "fixed" & char(34) & "/>
    <w:tblLook w:val=" & char(34) & "0600" & char(34) & "/>
  </w:tblPr>
  <w:tblGrid>" &
  concat(
    #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_forEach"(
      ri!headers,
      "<w:gridCol w:w=" & char(34) & "4500" & char(34) & "/>"
    )
  )
  & "</w:tblGrid>
  <w:tr>
    <w:trPr>
      <w:cantSplit w:val=" & char(34) & "0" & char(34) & "/>
      <w:tblHeader w:val=" & char(34) & "0" & char(34) & "/>
      <w:trHeight w:hRule=" & char(34) & "exact" & char(34) & " w:val=" & char(34) & "300" & char(34) & " />
    </w:trPr>" &
    concat(
      #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_forEach"(
        ri!headers,
        rule!AS_GSS_UT_createTableCell(
          column: fv!item,
          fontSize: local!fontSize,
          isDefaultFormattingForColumnText: true,
          isTextBolded: true
        )
      )
    ) &
    "</w:tr>
  </w:tbl>"
)

  "<w:p>

      <w:rPr>

        <w:rtl w:val=" & char(34) & "0" & char(34) & "/>
      </w:rPr>

    </w:r>
  </w:p>"
)

data.sail_code:
rule!AS_CO_UT_queryEntity(
  entity: cons!AS_GSS_ENT_USER,
  entityType: 'type!{urn:com:appian:types:AS:GSS}AS_GSS_User',
  returnType: ri!returnType,
  executeWhen: ri!executeWhen,
  triggerRefresh: ri!triggerRefresh,
  logicalExpression: #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_queryLogicalExpression"(
    operator: "AND",
    logicalExpressions: {
      #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_queryLogicalExpression"(
        operator: "AND",
        ignoreFiltersWithEmptyValues: true,
        filters: {
          #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_queryFilter"(
            field: "isActive",
            operator: "=",
            value: ri!isActive,
            applyWhen: rule!AS_CO_UT_isNotBlank(ri!isActive)
          ),
          #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_queryFilter"(
            field: "username",
            operator: "in",
            value: ri!usernames
          ),
          ri!additionalFilters
        }
      ),
      ri!logicalExpression
    }
  ),
  pagingInfo: ri!pagingInfo,
  sort: #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_sortInfo"(field: "firstName", ascending: true)
)

      field: "evaluation.evaluationId",
      operator: "=",
      value: ri!evaluationId

      operator: "=",

  logicalExpression: ri!logicalExpression,

)

expression_rules.name: AS_ADT_UT_captureMetadataDuringAudit
expression_rules.description: Captures metadata of a CDT if it or any of its children were updated, doing the same for all of its complex MULTIPLE children recursively.  Ideally, we should update this to work for all children.

data.sail_code:
rule!AS_CO_UT_captureMetadataIfUpdated(
  originalCdt: ri!oldObject,
  updatedCdt: if(
    rule!AS_CO_UT_isBlank(touniformstring(index(ri!auditConfig.complexFields, "fieldName", null))),
    ri!newObject,
    rule!AS_CO_UT_updateCdtFieldsByFieldValuePairs(
      cdt: ri!newObject,
      fieldValuePairs: #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_forEach"(
        items: ri!auditConfig.complexFields,
        expression: a!localVariables(
          local!complexFieldAuditConfig: fv!item,
          {
            field: local!complexFieldAuditConfig.fieldName,
            value: #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_forEach"(
              items: ri!newObject[local!complexFieldAuditConfig.fieldName],
              expression: rule!AS_ADT_UT_captureMetadataDuringAudit(
                newObject: fv!item,
                oldObject: if(
                  isnull(ri!oldObject),
                  null,
                  index(
                    rule!AS_CO_UT_filterCdtByField(
                      cdt: ri!oldObject[local!complexFieldAuditConfig.fieldName],
                      field: local!complexFieldAuditConfig.idField,
                      value: fv!item[local!complexFieldAuditConfig.idField]
                    ),
                    1,
                    null
                  )
                ),
                auditConfig: local!complexFieldAuditConfig,
                modifiedBy: ri!modifiedBy
              )
            )
          }
        )
      )
    )
  ),
  modifiedBy: ri!modifiedBy
)

    rule!AS_CO_UT_updateCdtFieldsByFieldValuePairs(
      cdt: ri!newObject,

expression_rules.name: AS_GSS_QE_getEvaluationCriteria
expression_rules.description: Returns evaluation criteria details based on the given filter set

data.sail_code:
rule!AS_CO_UT_queryEntity(
  entity: cons!AS_GSS_ENT_CRITERIA,
  entityType: 'type!{urn:com:appian:types:AS:GSS}AS_GSS_Criteria',
  returnType: ri!returnType,
  excludeNestedCdts: ri!excludeNestedCdts,
  executeWhen: and(
    ri!executeWhen,
    or(
      rule!AS_CO_UT_isNotBlank(ri!additionalFilters.value),
      rule!AS_CO_UT_isNotBlank(ri!logicalExpression),
      rule!AS_CO_UT_isNotBlank(ri!aggregation),
      rule!AS_CO_UT_isNotBlank(ri!criteriaId),
      rule!AS_CO_UT_isNotBlank(ri!parentCriteriaId),
      rule!AS_CO_UT_isNotBlank(ri!evaluationId)
    )
  ),
  /* To ensure proper null checks, we'll force all queryFilter values to not be null */
  logicalExpression: ri!logicalExpression,
  pagingInfo: ri!pagingInfo,
  triggerRefresh: ri!triggerRefresh,
  filters: {
    #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_queryFilter"(
      field: "criteriaId",
      operator: "in",
      value: ri!criteriaId
    ),
    #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_queryFilter"(
      field: "parentCriteriaId",
      operator: "=",
      value: ri!parentCriteriaId
    ),
    #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_queryFilter"(
      field: "evaluation.evaluationId",
      operator: "in",
      value: ri!evaluationId
    ),
    #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_queryFilter"(
      field: "isActive",
      operator: "=",
      value: true,
      applyWhen: rule!AS_CO_UT_not(ri!getActiveAndInactive = true)
    ),
    #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_queryFilter"(
      field: "criteriaStatus.refDataId",
      operator: "<>",
      value: cons!AS_GSS_REF_ID_EVALUATION_STATUS_TEMP,
      applyWhen: rule!AS_CO_UT_not(ri!getTemp = true)
    ),
    ri!additionalFilters
  },
  aggregation: ri!aggregation,
  sort: ri!sort
)

expression_rules.name: AS_GSS_QE_getConsensusReport
expression_rules.description: Returns consensus report details based on the given filter set

data.sail_code:
/*Note: This rule cannot have assertions*/
rule!AS_CO_UT_queryEntity(
  entity: cons!AS_GSS_ENT_CONSENSUS_REPORT,
  entityType: 'type!{urn:com:appian:types:AS:GSS}AS_GSS_Consensus_Report',
  returnType: ri!returnType,
  excludeNestedCdts: ri!excludeNestedCdts,
  executeWhen: and(
    ri!executeWhen,
    or(
      any(
        rule!AS_CO_UT_isNotBlank(_),
        {
          ri!additionalFilters,
          ri!logicalExpression,
          ri!aggregation
        }
      ),
      rule!AS_CO_UT_isNotBlank(ri!consensusId),
      rule!AS_CO_UT_isNotBlank(ri!factorId),
      rule!AS_CO_UT_isNotBlank(ri!vendorId),
      rule!AS_CO_UT_isNotBlank(ri!status),
      rule!AS_CO_UT_isNotBlank(ri!evaluationid)
    )
  ),
  /* To ensure proper null checks, we'll force all queryFilter values to not be null */
  logicalExpression: ri!logicalExpression,
  pagingInfo: ri!pagingInfo,
  triggerRefresh: ri!triggerRefresh,
  filters: {
    #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_queryFilter"(
      field: "consensusId",
      operator: "in",
      value: ri!consensusId
    ),
    #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_queryFilter"(
      field: "consensusId",
      operator: "not in",
      value: ri!excludeConsensusId
    ),
    #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_queryFilter"(
      field: "factorId",
      operator: "=",
      value: ri!factorId
    ),
    #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_queryFilter"(
      field: "vendorId",
      operator: "=",
      value: ri!vendorId
    ),
    #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_queryFilter"(
      field: "status.refDataId",
      operator: "in",
      value: ri!status
    ),
    #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_queryFilter"(
      field: "evaluationId",
      operator: "in",
      value: ri!evaluationId
    ),
    #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_queryFilter"(
      field: "isActive",
      operator: "=",
      value: true,
      applywhen: rule!AS_CO_UT_not(ri!getActiveAndInactive = true)
    ),
    #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_queryFilter"(
      field: "isArchived",
      operator: "in",
      value: a!defaultValue(
        value: ri!isArchived,
        default: {false}
      )
    ),
    ri!additionalFilters
  },
  aggregation: ri!aggregation,
  sort: ri!sort,
  batchSize: ri!batchSize
)
